scripts.start: if [ ! -d build ]; then npm run build:deploy; fi && parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run serve'
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:images && npm run build:icons
scripts.build:css: postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-cssnext -u postcss-reporter --postcss-reporter.clearMessages true -u csswring --no-map -o build/assets/css/style.css src/assets/css/style.css
scripts.build:images: copyfiles -u 2 -f src/assets/images/* src/assets/images/**/* build/assets/images && imageoptim -d ./build/assets/images && imagemin ./build/assets/images/* -p=webp -o=./build/assets/images && imagemin ./build/assets/images/* -p=webp -o=./build/assets/images
scripts.build:deploy: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run build && npm run move:assets
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.watch:js: eye --*glob=src/assets/javascript/**/*.js,%**/*-min.js npm run lint:js and npm run build:js
scripts.watch:css: eye --*glob=src/assets/css/**/*.css,%**/*-min.css npm run lint:css and npm run build:css
